features: Make Learning Fun - Straw Construction toys are at the forefront of STEM educational toys for kids. The psychological drive behind these kind of toys engages a child's thought processes to plan, design and construct an operating or moving model that has a particular function or outcome by the end allowing the kid an expression of achievement while expanding on their boundaries of creativity.

600PCS STEM Building Toy - 11.6inch long straws x 80, 3.7inch short straws x 220, Connectors x 300. There are a sufficient number of 600PCS can meet all your Kid’s needs to build bigger and various creations. Among the styles of connectors we have added a new style - tires, which allows your child to match more new styles and make them move, such as cars or planes with landing gear.

Great Educational Gift for All ages - It's not often that a science project can be fun and engaging, But this STEM building toys achieves both! Great set for individual play or as a group activity. It fascinates children as soon as they pull it out of the box and is a perfect STEM project. It increased the children's interest in engineering and develops their motor skills and logic thinking, attracting your child's attention and keeping them away from screens for hours of STEM learning.

STEM toy - Not only are Straw Constructor Toys enjoyable, they also promote STEM learning. As kids create and experiment with their structures, they develop problem-solving skills, hand-eye coordination, and spatial reasoning. Plus, it's a fun way for families and friends to bond and work together on a project. And with its compact size, Straw Constructor Toys can easily be taken on the go for building fun anywhere. So why settle for ordinary toys when you can have the exciting and educational experience of Straw Constructor Toys? Get yours today and see where your imagination takes you!

Safety First - Our STEM building toys were lab tested to meet CPSC regulations and all necessary safety standards. We really hope your kids will be thrilled with these excellent straw constructors and offer 100% money back satisfaction guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for creative kids
reviews.reviewText: Got these as a gift for my 8 year old nephew for Christmas. He loves building with legos and playing Minecraft, so you can tell he likes to create things. But mom said no more legos this year as he has so many already. So I found these. I had a similar set as a kid that only had the long straws and jack like connectors. This comes with smaller straws, more variety of connectors and even a plastic bin carrying case! This was his favorite gift and first toy played with... over video games!!! The look on his face when I told him all of the things I made and he realized just how much he could do (my favorites were the rocket ship and I'd make giant 3D fish).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW KIDS LOVE THESE
reviews.reviewText: my 3 and 5 year old can play for hoursthey really like it and it comes with a storage container so you can always keep it in the container not like other sellers that comes in a bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun new building toy
reviews.reviewText: Like K-nex but cheaper/with straws. Good idea and kept me entertained for quite a while experimenting. Wish they had a “medium/middle” length in between the long and short, and/or a smaller one than the short for more advanced construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandkids love to build things and try to match the pictures that came with itThey were so excited they had never had anything like it before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun meets Function
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this straw construction toy for my daughter to aid in her occupational therapy for fine motor skill development. I am thrilled with not only the product but also the results. This toy has exceeded my expectations and has become an integral part of my daughter's therapy routine as well as everyday play. She thoroughly enjoys the hands-on nature and has shown remarkable progress in finger strength, dexterity, and coordination. Our home sessions have helped her refine her grasp and enhance her ability to manipulate small objects with precision. She no longer fights me when the “frustration factor” kicks in because she is too excited to continue building and creating with her colorful straws and connectors. The open-ended nature of the toys sparks her creativity and imagination, making the sessions both productive and entertaining. She particularly enjoys modeling - I build something, and then she repeats it. I have gradually increased the difficulty level and provided age-appropriate challenges. Straw construction has benefited my daughter and has become an activity we can enjoy together at home as a family.Additionally, I bought two extra sets because as a family of four our creations were getting more innovative. They arrived at our office and one of my teammates became interested and started building something. A patient (we work at a dental office) jumped in and started playing with them too. It seems that putting something in dental phobics' hands relaxes them by engaging their mind. Win! We have put a big tub in the waiting room, and frankly, I am impressed by the soothing nature. We have been proudly "gifted" flower, cars, puppies made out of straws. Many have asked where we have bought them, and we proudly say Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023

reviews.reviewText: The children enjoyed making various items with these straws and connectors.

Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my preschool class. They instantly got to work/play. Be carful with some of the connectors. They are very fragile and can break easily. Only a few of them. I’m think of getting another set for myself. It’s also very therapeutic.
